tool_description: A simple functional that provides functions for cartesian point calculations.
name: PointCalculation
title: PointCalculation

api_list.name: Translate Point
api_list.description: Moves point a given distance and angle

api_list.name: Distance
api_list.description: Finds the distance between two points

api_list.name: Rotate Point
api_list.description: Rotates a point around another point by a given angle.

api_list.name: Find Point on Line
api_list.description: Returns a point between to points as a given distance

api_list.name: Angle
api_list.description: Finds the angle of the line that passes through both of the points. Angle is returned in Radians.
